subject: Basketball (College)
Parades
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: About 10,000 fans lined Hartford’s Bushnell Park to cheer the national champion UConn women as they passed by on the top of a double-decker bus.
snippet: About 10,000 fans lined Hartford’s Bushnell Park to cheer the national champion UConn women as they passed by on the top of a double-decker bus.
